The bruma torch is a possible reward from a supply crate, which is obtained from subduing the Wintertodt.

The torch acts as an equippable light source and as a warm clothing item in the Wintertodt boss fight. The torch works as a light source unequipped, and can be used to light braziers instead of a tinderbox in the Wintertodt's prison. In addition, it can be used to smoke deadfall traps. This item can be stored in the magic wardrobe of a costume room.

The torch does not cause explosions in the Lumbridge Swamp Caves if used as a light source.

If the player has three bruma torches in their bank and/or inventory, supply crates will instead give a torstol seed when it would have given a torch.[1] Players can also trade in bruma torches for an extra supply crate or 50 burnt pages via Ignisia. As the Grand Exchange price of 50 burnt pages is currently 159,700 and the price of a torstol seed is 61,988, it is generally better to exchange torches for burnt pages unless you are an ironman who wishes to receive torstol seeds.

Changes[edit | edit source]

16 January 2020
(update | poll)

The Bruma torch can now be used to light braziers and smoke hunter traps.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 14 May 2018. (Archived from the original on 29 July 2019.) Mod Ash: "The dev who made that table does indeed appear to have written it so that if the game's thinking of giving you gloves, and you already have 3+ pairs, it'll give you a magic seed instead. Same for torches and the torstol seed. It's an unusual bit of code, but looks intentional."

The '''bruma torch ''' is a possible reward from a [[supply crate]], which is obtained from subduing the [[Wintertodt]].

The torch acts as an equippable [[Light sources|light source]] and as a [[Wintertodt/Warm clothing|warm clothing]] item in the Wintertodt boss fight. The torch works as a light source unequipped, and can be used to light [[brazier]]s instead of a [[tinderbox]] in the Wintertodt's prison. In addition, it can be used to smoke [[deadfall trap]]s. {{Costume storage|magic wardrobe}}

The torch does not cause explosions in the [[Lumbridge Swamp Caves]] if used as a light source.

If the player has three bruma torches in their bank and/or inventory, supply crates will instead give a [[torstol seed]] when it would have given a torch.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/995775915039903744|date=14 May 2018|archiveurl=https://archive.is/cVIWs|archivedate=29 July 2019|quote=The dev who made that table does indeed appear to have written it so that if the game's thinking of giving you gloves, and you already have 3+ pairs, it'll give you a magic seed instead. Same for torches and the torstol seed. It's an unusual bit of code, but looks intentional.}} Players can also trade in bruma torches for an [[extra supply crate]] or 50 [[burnt page]]s via [[Ignisia]]. As the Grand Exchange price of 50 burnt pages is currently {{Coins|{{#expr:{{GEP|Burnt page}}*50}}}} and the price of a torstol seed is {{Coins|{{GEP|Torstol seed}}}}, it is generally better to exchange torches for burnt pages unless you are an [[Ironman Mode|ironman]] who wishes to receive torstol seeds.
